alert.note: Alert for Kingman; Sedgwick (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 4:10PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Sedgwick and Kingman Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 408 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a handful of strong thunderstorms over Kingman and Sedgwick counties, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph, pea size hail, torrential rainfall, frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wichita, Derby, Andover, Haysville, Park City, Valley Center, Bel Aire, Mulvane, Goddard, Rose Hill, Maize, Kingman, Clearwater, Cheney, Sedgwick, Colwich, Garden Plain, Mount Hope, Downtown Wichita and Kechi. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
